author: Stephanie Hallett
title: Kristen Bell has convinced us that “bumblebee chic” should be a thing
text:
Kristen Bell has convinced us that “bumblebee chic” should be a thing She fills our hearts with love and our screens with some of the funniest and most heartfelt portrayals in Hollywood, and today Kristen Bell inspired us to try the “bumblebee chic” look, because her ensemble was damn near perfection .
Attending a press event for new film, CHiPS , in New York on Wednesday, Bell donned a pair of wear-everywhere black overalls over a mustard yellow long-sleeve tee, and tied the whole A.L.C. look together with pointy-toe black heels and her signature wavy ‘do. The overall effect is incredibly chic, but also blissfully achievable for regular folks like us who want to take a page from Bell’s style book.
Cindy Ord/Getty Images Can you say freshhh! We’re obsessed.
Bell’s jumpsuit game has been on point lately. The actress donned a metallic, mermaid-style one piece to the People’s Choice Awards in January that had us rethinking our formalwear wardrobes. And now with this look in our back pockets, it’s safe to say jumpsuits are fast becoming our everyday outfits of choice.

Today, Bell and her husband, Dax Shepard, were on hand at SiriusXM’s studios to promote their new movie, which Shepard wrote, directed, and stars in. They’ve been making the media rounds this week and in an interview with People on Monday , the couple opened up about how they keep their famously joyful relationship in tact.
“We have a very healthy marriage and we got there by doing therapy when we needed it, and constantly doing fierce moral inventories,” said Bell.
“We both take responsibility when we are wrong, and I think it is easy to work with him because I married him, because I enjoy spending time with him and I trust him. That is exactly what I want in someone that I work with.” Sounds like exactly the kind of marriage we should all aspire to!
